title: Which is example of process of assimilation Piaget

content.prompt: Which of the following is the best example of the cognitive process Jean Piaget called assimilation?

choices.label: When her father cuts her single slice of pizza into three pieces, Megan thinks she has more than her sister, who has a single slice.
When her mother leaves the room, Lillian continues playing with toys without becoming anxious.
Having learned that his family pet is a dog, William sees a neighbor’s cat and says, “Dog!”
David, who previously called all animals “doggies,” sees a horse and says, “Horse!”

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
